sub_title: Office 365 Service Support Engineer at CRH
summary: Experienced Information Technology Engineer with a demonstrated history of working for Government, Military and private sector: in Networking and Automotive industry. Skilled in IT Services/Project Management, Microsoft products (AD/Office 365 etc) and processes automation with scripting. Strong information technology professional with an Engineer degree in Business Information Technology from Skarbek Graduate School of Business Economics.

school.name: Skarbek Graduate School of Business Economics

profile_positions.description:
Key activities: 
- Assist in the development and implementation of new technologies and tools required to deliver services, providing first, second and third line support when required 
- Full life cycle management of all applications under the scope of the Collaboration platform (i.e eXclaimer, GSX and any future purchases) 
- Manage all current and future Office 365 applications and objects including enabling and disabling on per OpCo/platform basis 
- Mobile device management 
- Mail flow management, including test and implementation 
- Awareness of upcoming Microsoft updates in order to prepare the platform, the Collaboration Support team and to advise local service desks and any other relevant parties 
- Liaise with Service Support Lead to update and maintain service support processes and procedures 
- Create and evolve documentation related to Collaboration and Office 365 applications 

Maintain the test and production environments:
- Work with the Security and Compliance Engineer to ensure privileged access to test and production environments is regularly audited 
- Attend technical meetings with local service desks and relevant suppliers to transfer knowledge, maintain relationships and diagnose incidents 
- Review documentation, FAQs and knowledge articles written by Change Leads and service desk analysts 
- Identify problems and highlight relevant actions to the Service Support Lead 
- Assist in the development and implementation of consistent and repeatable processes and procedures   
- Provide migration support for MD&A Activities
profile_positions.title: Office 365, Global Service Support Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Achievements:
- Interviewing/approving for hire candidates for IT support roles for EMEA and APAC also for managers positions
- Coaching given to less experienced team members
- Significantly improved quality of end users experience with automation of EU NewHire script that cover all European needs that were not configured on US build, like: multi languages support for MS Office, auto implementation of softphone software + call centers, delivery or sales application, etc.
- Implemented automation for Users Termination Data Backup process
- Implemented UniFlow/Print Secure solution at major offices in EU – potential savings ~30%
- Built EU monitoring tool, based on freeware Cacti service solution, on Linux server (Ubuntu)
- Initiated Mobile Maintenance Outsourcing Project with Tangoe – potential savings ~20%
- Responsible for providing more functional scanning system for EU Finance team
- Built excellent relationship with employees across all departments in organization
- ViP and Executives support
- First escalation point for vendors (including payments issues, subscriptions upgrade, etc.)
profile_positions.title: EMEA, IT – Operations, Senior Desktop Support
